channel.title: Read Rust - Web and Network Services
channel.description: Web and Network Services posts on Read Rust

item.title: DataFusion: Big Data Platform for Rust
item.description: DataFusion is an open-source Big Data platform implemented in the Rust programming language with a similar programming style to Apache Spark.
item.dc:creator: Andy Grove

item.title: Rust and WebAssembly with Turtle - /var/blog
item.description: In this post, I'll walk through a few of the highlights of getting Turtle, a Rust library for creating animated drawings, to run in the browser with WebAssembly.
item.dc:creator: Marshall Pierce
